scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cat toolkit.scss | node_modules/.bin/node-sass --include-path node_modules/ --output-style compressed > dist/toolkit.css
scripts.build-pages: cat toolkit.scss | node_modules/.bin/node-sass --include-path node_modules/ --output-style compressed > pages/css/toolkit.css
scripts.update-pages: rm -r -f node_modules/sky-toolkit-core && rm -r -f node_modules/sky-toolkit-ui && npm install && npm run build-pages
